scripts.build:libraries: concurrently "cd packages/navmesh && npm run build" "cd packages/phaser-navmesh && npm run build" "cd packages/phaser2-navmesh && npm run build"
scripts.watch:libs: lerna run --parallel watch --scope navmesh --scope phaser-navmesh --scope phaser2-navmesh
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd packages/examples-phaser3 && npm run serve" "cd packages/examples-phaser2 && npm run serve -- --port 8081" "cd packages/examples-node && npm run serve -- -- --port=8082"
scripts.postdoc: cp -r doc-source/ docs/ && cp -r doc-source/ docs/manual/
